meanings.definition: Very small; one billionth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: The nano chip was tiny but powerful.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the nano particles under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The nano ant tried to lift a crumb bigger than itself.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as soft as a nano breeze.
meanings.sent5: The nano world is full of wonders invisible to the naked eye.

meanings.definition: Denoting a factor of one billionth.
meanings.sent1: The nano measurement was incredibly precise.
meanings.sent2: The nano scale allowed for accurate calculations.
meanings.sent3: The nano joke was so small, nobody heard it.
meanings.sent4: His patience was as thin as a nano wire.
meanings.sent5: The nano adjustment made a huge difference in the experiment.

meanings.definition: Denoting a size or scale that is extremely small.
meanings.sent1: The nano world of insects is fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The nano details in the painting were exquisite.
meanings.sent3: The nano kitten got lost in a shoebox.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a nano star.
meanings.sent5: The nano car maneuvered through the crowded streets effortlessly.
